name: Rocket Blast (Elastiskalinjen)
description:
Introduction

In Rocket Blast, you take on the role of a tiny rocket that needs energy to continue moving! 
Tip -> Breaking will slow you down but it will make you turn faster, this is the key to higher scores!

Controls Keyboard

Steer: Left / Right arrow keys
Gas: Z
Brake: X

Controller

Steer: D-pad / Joystick
Gas: A / Y
Brake: B / X

Credits

Sebastian Lind Twitter

Good luck and have fun!
